00057   class PSF : public AtomicGroup {
00058   public:
00059     PSF() { }
00060     virtual ~PSF() {}
00061 
00062     explicit PSF(const std::string fname) {
00063       std::ifstream ifs(fname.c_str());
00064       if (!ifs) {
00065         throw(std::runtime_error("Cannot open PSF file " + std::string(fname)));
00066       }
00067       read(ifs);
00068     }
00069 
00070     explicit PSF(std::ifstream &ifs) {
00071       read(ifs);
00072     }
00073 
00075     virtual PSF* clone(void) const;
00076 
00078     PSF copy(void) const;
00079 
00080     void read(std::istream& is);  
00081 
00082 
00083   private:
00084 
00085     PSF(const AtomicGroup& grp) : AtomicGroup(grp) { }
00086 
00087 
00088     void parseAtomRecord(const std::string s);  
00089   
00091     int deduceAtomicNumber(pAtom pa);
00092 
00093   };
